update sps_brand set brand_name = #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_english_name = #{brandEnglishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_category_ids = #{brandCategoryIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_abbreviation = #{brandAbbreviation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_des = #{brandDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_small_url = #{brandSmallUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_big_url = #{brandBigUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_delete_flag = #{brandDeleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, brand_create_time = #{brandCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, brand_update_time = #{brandUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from sps_brand where 1=1
and brand_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and brand_english_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{brandEnglishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and FIND_IN_SET(#{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, brand_category_ids)
AND FIND_IN_SET(#{categoryIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},brand_category_ids)
AND brand_delete_flag = 0 order by brand_create_time desc
